column4: Is pulseaudio configurable at all? Inputs/outputs/what sounds come out of where type of thing? I have a headset and can't seem to make any use of it.
Right click on the volume icon, and select Sound Preferences (if you're using Ubuntu 9.10)
wow. I just upgraded. let me dig through that. thx.
anyway to select the output based on the application? for instance would like skype on headset but rhythmbox on speakers..
Skype makes it a bit awkward, but for most applications you should be able to select a custom output device on the Output tab.
